sponsorship_benefit: This Conference will provide a forum for exchange of ideas and authoritative views by leading scientists as well as business         leaders and investors in this exciting field. Outstanding keynote speakers and well known leading scientists and experts from        around the globe will be expected to share their knowledge. When becoming our partner, we will do our outmost to satisfy your        needs for involvement and exposure. Our sponsor packages offer pre-defined exposure opportunities, but don’t hesitate to bring        us your personal requests.
